text: Victims must be without blemish, idolaters are to be slain, controversies are to be decided by the high priest and counsel, whose sentence must be obeyed under pain of death, the duty of a king, who is to receive the law of God at the priest's hands.

segments.text: Victims must be without blemish, idolaters are to be slain, controversies are to be decided
by the high priest and counsel, whose sentence must be obeyed under pain of death, the duty
of a king, who is to receive the law of God at the priest's hands.
